thread.title: Terrifying new attraction coming to Manchester
thread.title_full: Terrifying new attraction coming to Manchester | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Terrifying new attraction coming to Manchester
text:
With Halloween fast approaching, a terrifying new attraction is opening its doors in Manchester.
The House of the Dead, based at the Great Northern Warehouse, invites visitors to wind their way through twisting corridors- keeping a close watch on the 30-strong cast of actors which populate the abandoned building.
Credit: House of the Dead Ltd The Director at House of the Dead Ltd, Richard Cottier, said:
â€œThe sets look fantastic and we can promise a truly immersive horror experience.
"We are very excited to hear just how loud we can make our guests scream"
House of the Dead measures 6,200sq feet and stretches over two floors. It will take 40 minutes to walk through.
A team of designers and craftsmen have been working on the project for two months.
Last updated Tue 29 Sep 2015 Entertainment manchester Greater Manchester
